title: cyberthreat indicators
extract: 1. “Cyber Threat Indicator,” as defined by the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015 (CISA) CISA defines “cyber threat indicator” as “information that is necessary to describe or identify— (A) malicious reconnaissance, including anomalous patterns of communications that appear to be.
